import React, {useState} from 'react' import {connect} from 'react-redux' import {createStructuredSelector} from 'reselect' import {selectCollectionTags, selectFilterMenu, selectCollection} from '../../redux/shop/shop.selectors' import {ArrowIcon} from '../icons/icons.component' import {FilterMenuContainer, TagsListContainer, TagItem, FilterOptionsHeader, FilterOptionsContainer, FilterOptions, FormGroup, CustomCheckbox } from './filter-menu.styles' const FilterMenu = ({tags, hidden, fetchFilteredCollection, selectCollection}) => { console.log(selectCollection.map(collection => collection.items .filter(item => item.tags.includes('running')))) const tagsFlatMap = [...new Set(tags[0])] const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false) return ( { tagsFlatMap.map(item => ( {item} )) }

Gender

 setIsOpen(!isOpen)}>

Shop By Price

 ) } const mapStateToProps = createStructuredSelector({ tags: selectCollectionTags, hidden: selectFilterMenu, selectCollection: selectCollection("mens") }) export default connect(mapStateToProps)(FilterMenu)
